channel.title: Server wont run, changed spawn.cfg
channel.description:
First this is the error code popping up when i run my server: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 7 at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:4121) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:37) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:70) [/code]
After looking into it i found lots of people have posted this same problem (mostly after changing item.cfg) but have been unsolved. The people giving advice on it have said two main solutions -there is a space some where that should have a tab (i looked through my spawn.cfg pretty well and didnt see any) or -the values are filled in incorrectly (i think this maybe my problem)
ex: the top of my spawn.cfg says: [code]// spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description[/code]
so it should be [code]// spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description spawn = 914 3098 3926 0 1 30 90 90 BattleMage3 Wildly[/code] (five numbers between the coords and the description)
but i have some codes like this but is it something that was already in the coding, not something i added [code]// spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description //Home spawn = 555 3084 3500 0 0 0 0 0 0 skill cape shop spawn = 2566 3086 3500 0 0 0 0 0 1 wise old man spawn = 522 3077 3511 0 0 0 0 0 0 IBUYANYTHING spawn = 520 3080 3512 0 0 0 0 0 1 GenStore spawn = 290 3084 3511 0 0 0 0 0 0 2b tickets spawn = 599 3081 3486 0 0 0 0 0 0 Makeover mage spawn = 2258 3106 3560 0 0 0 0 0 2 Mage of zammy[/code] (six numbers between the coords and description on these)
because it is not following the pattern that is on top i feel like the codes with the extra number are the wrong codes that are messing this up but i dont want to go deleting stuff without knowing what they are there for. -what is the extra number representing on these codes? -should i be adding a number to all the codes with 5 there or should i be deleting one on all the codes with 6?
If anyone knows how to fix this problem please help out as soon as possible so that i can figure this out and finish the spawns.

item.title: Server wont run, changed spawn.cfg
item.dc:creator: @trilogy-reborn trilogy-reborn
item.description:
@trilogy-reborn wrote:

well thanks for all the help and info yall.
Also i just started working on my client for the first time and im having a models problem
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,670574.0.html

my problem this thread was for has been solved so a mod can lock this or something since it keeps getting bumped by our conversation.

Read full topic

item.title: Server wont run, changed spawn.cfg
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

FoHammer:

Interesting. Just throwing this out there though never pay someone to code your source. Keep your source to yourself, keep it secure, keep working on it and it’ll be valueble. Programming takes time to learn and that’s the only way you’ll learn is by spending time, praticing, and studying is the best way. Don’t give people copies unless you’re releasing it for people to use. Especially if you’re actually doing and putting what you’re saying into action. And I don’t understand what you’re even trying to say in the 2nd edit, your 2011 RS “Remake” is probably a [PI] itself.

The RS2011 remake is probably the mentos 2011 release, and not a PI.
A.K.A: This server. https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,609126.0.html

[quote=“trilogy-reborn, post:9, topic:551521”]yeah ofc playing rsps’s with boring quest where you go kill a boss and your done is the reason i want to make a few small story lines and maybe a big storyline involving pvp gear, the gods, or something. im trying to make mine very unique and interesting to play. no clue if ill ever host it or not since i was told vs hosting, and advertising can be very expensive. also i can easy do the free forums websites myself but i would also have to learn html forums coding or pay someone to do it cause i think the free forums seem to suck and the add banners they put everywhere are annoying

but hosting one day or not… learning & coding these rsps’s is a very fun side hobby for me to do when im not at work. my progress is a little slow because i’ve learned a ton lately but im still pretty new but im getting lots of progress and having fun doing it.

Edit:
Also if i do host it one day dont i have to get permission from xenon since that is my starting source?
ive changed a lot and plan to do tons more before that point so it wont really be a leach but i think i still need permission

Edit #2: also with the i have a rs2011 remake source with that interface and it works but the code for that source is so different from the pi source i been learning everything on it is very confusing. i could probably rip the files no problem but i think it would take a bit of reprogramming to make all the buttons work on the pi source but that will be something i research a bit and try to figure out myself. someone offered to do it for me for 50$ but this being a hobby to me; him doing it would not be helpful to me lol i want to learn and do it myself so that i accomplish something nice lol[/quote]
Hosting can be costly and it can be cheap. it depends where you buy, and when. I buy domains for 50 cents. Yes, 50 cents. And others buy them for $1-$20. It all depends on where you shop. I also have a VPS that I’m only playing $10 a month on, add on webhosting and I’m only paying $17 a month to host my rsps.
But if it was publicly hosted and I had forum adverts and etc, I’d probably want a better vps than the $10 one, so that’d be upgraded to one of twice it’s value or more. Just to ensure my players get no lag (As I haven’t had lag on my current one).

Since the server was released, you don’t actually have to give credits, unless you release the server for download as well. You can give credits if you’d like, but be weary, as if you tell people which client you used, they might be able to find a copy of it and then connect to your server using their client… Which can lead to lots of exploits if you don’t have server sided checks in place (And some even if you do have those checks).

Read full topic

item.title: Server wont run, changed spawn.cfg
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Adding that character design interface would be rather difficult, as you’d probably have to modify lots of the client. I’d rather just use a client that already has it… Or at the least try to rip it from one of the newer clients that does have it.

As for the rest, you should go ahead and work on it… Custom quests are always good, just try to add a story line to it and not just a quest for the player to find random crap and give it to a guy, then maybe kill a boss. At least put work into it.

Read full topic

item.title: Server wont run, changed spawn.cfg
item.dc:creator: @trilogy-reborn trilogy-reborn
item.description:
@trilogy-reborn wrote:

@sk8rdude
oh well i know how to figure it out now. and btw i think it was on a different help thread i posted but you posted a link for me to learn how to understand some java. i didnt look at it right away but i checked it out a couple weeks ago and it was a bit confusing at first but pretty helpful in the end. Thank you for that and also thanks for nearly always being the first person to help me on my problems.

I really want to get good at coding rsps so i can make a very good and unique pi rsps (using a xenon source atm) and maybe move up to the harder rsps’s to code one day like rs2011 remake- i have the rs2011 remake source but it is way different from pi and pretty confusing so i want to master pi and delta before moving up to working on that source.

I am about to go take a look in the developement section to see if posting my progress there is something id like to do or not.
i want to show my progress but also i have some origanal ideas im working on that i dont want someone else to put into their server. so idk

If there is more things your can teach me and wouldnt mind with maybe we can add each others emails or get on skype or team speak someday.

here are some plans i want to work on that i will spending a lot of time coming up trying to learn/ figure out:
-i have xenon pi base but i want the high detail awesome character creation/ customization like eoc/ rs3 had.

-i want to make lots of custom quests with good stories/ diologue.
-skilling randoms like gems from mining, guards when theiving.
-got couple custom minigame ideas (rather not say here for others to read)
-there is a lot more id like to do but i think this message is long enough lol i can always tell you more later if you get intrested what i am working on.

sorry this is so long, thanks for reading it, and let me know what you think please.
ttyl
-mike

Read full topic

item.title: Server wont run, changed spawn.cfg
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

That issue is one of the few reasons I went to JSON instead of the cfg files.

JSON is more readable and if you make an error in that it’s rather obvious, and even if you don’t see it, the parser will usually tell you the exact line or object it failed to read.

Read full topic

item.title: Server wont run, changed spawn.cfg
item.dc:creator: @trilogy-reborn trilogy-reborn
item.description:
@trilogy-reborn wrote:

thanks everyone who replied to help. it actually was the exact problem i thought it was in the first place.
there was a space somewhere when there should have been a space and i found a good way to fix it myself.

Tip for the next person that ends up on this page because they are having the same problem:
I figured out a simple/ obvious way to find and fix the problem.

1.) ctrl+ f to bring up the find tool.
2.) search for space - " "
3.) if you find any in the middle of your code just replace it with a tab

lol with so much codes looking for a space rather than a tab just seems overwhelming but i didnt realize how easy of a problem it was to fix.

Read full topic

item.title: Server wont run, changed spawn.cfg
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

// spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description //Home spawn = 555 3084 3500 0 0 0 0 0 skill cape shop spawn = 2566 3086 3500 0 0 0 0 0 wise old man spawn = 522 3077 3511 0 0 0 0 0 IBUYANYTHING spawn = 520 3080 3512 0 0 0 0 0 GenStore spawn = 290 3084 3511 0 0 0 0 0 2b tickets spawn = 599 3081 3486 0 0 0 0 0 Makeover mage spawn = 2258 3106 3560 0 0 0 0 0 Mage of zammy
Either the NPC’s you added have 1 value fewer than what the server tries to parse or the NPC’s already in the spawn file have 1 value too much. Post your NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn() method so I can have a better look.

Read full topic

item.title: Server wont run, changed spawn.cfg
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Make sure your tabbing is correct… You either have not enough on one line, or too many (Tabs or spaces).
Here’s an example on a similar error you can use to debug where your error is.
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=665178.5

Read full topic

item.title: Server wont run, changed spawn.cfg
item.dc:creator: @trilogy-reborn trilogy-reborn
item.description:
@trilogy-reborn wrote:

First this is the error code popping up when i run my server:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 7 at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:4121) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:37) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:70)

After looking into it i found lots of people have posted this same problem (mostly after changing item.cfg) but have been unsolved.
The people giving advice on it have said two main solutions
-there is a space some where that should have a tab (i looked through my spawn.cfg pretty well and didnt see any)
or
-the values are filled in incorrectly (i think this maybe my problem)

ex:
the top of my spawn.cfg says:

so it should be

// spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description spawn = 914 3098 3926 0 1 30 90 90 BattleMage3 Wildly
(five numbers between the coords and the description)

but i have some codes like this but is it something that was already in the coding, not something i added

// spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description //Home spawn = 555 3084 3500 0 0 0 0 0 0 skill cape shop spawn = 2566 3086 3500 0 0 0 0 0 1 wise old man spawn = 522 3077 3511 0 0 0 0 0 0 IBUYANYTHING spawn = 520 3080 3512 0 0 0 0 0 1 GenStore spawn = 290 3084 3511 0 0 0 0 0 0 2b tickets spawn = 599 3081 3486 0 0 0 0 0 0 Makeover mage spawn = 2258 3106 3560 0 0 0 0 0 2 Mage of zammy
(six numbers between the coords and description on these)

because it is not following the pattern that is on top i feel like the codes with the extra number are the wrong codes that are messing this up but i dont want to go deleting stuff without knowing what they are there for.
-what is the extra number representing on these codes?
-should i be adding a number to all the codes with 5 there or should i be deleting one on all the codes with 6?

If anyone knows how to fix this problem please help out as soon as possible so that i can figure this out and finish the spawns.
